docs.title: Meet HomeR
docs.text: Home(plate)R(obot) is an open-source mobile robot platform. HomeR is designed for educational purposes with emphases on autonomous SLAM and navigation. It features a differential drive mobile base regulated by a Raspberry Pi Pico microcontroller. The Robot Operating System (ROS), as a butler serves a Raspberry Pi SBC making high-level decisions.

docs.title: Key Specifications
docs.text: Features Details Dimensions 180 x 180 x 180 Microcontroller Raspberry Pi Pico 2 (RP2350) MicroPython Firmware 1.27.0 Computer Raspberry Pi 5 (4GB) Operating System Ubuntu 24.04 Robot Manager ROS2 Jazzy

docs.title: Open-Sourced
docs.text:
• Mechanical design: https://github.com/linzhangUCA/homer_me
  • Electrical design: https://github.com/linzhangUCA/homer_ee
  • Microcontroller scripts: https://github.com/linzhangUCA/homer_pico
  • Hardward interfacing (ROS) package: https://github.com/linzhangUCA/homer_bringup
  • SLAM and navigation (ROS) package: https://github.com/linzhangUCA/homer_navigation

Resources

All the hardware components are easy to access or 3d printable.

docs.title: 1.1 Preparation
docs.text:
• 1x motor holder (3d printable)
  • 1x 25mm diameter DC motor
  • 2x M3x10mm screw
  • 1x 4mm bore hex motor shaft coupler
  • 1x M4x6mm screw (and washer)
  • 1x 65mm diameter wheel/tire

docs.title: 1.2 Post Assemble
docs.text:
Motor Wires

Make sure motor wires sticking out from the same side as the flat surface of the motor holder

You will need to assemble 2 wheels.

docs.title: 3D-Print Recipe
docs.text:
You'll need to print out following parts to set up the frame for HomeR.

  • 1x base
  • 1x second floor
  • 1x caster wheel
  • 2x motor holder

Mechanical designs

  • You can add the 3mf profile in OrcaSlicer.
  • The FreeCAD designs are availbale on Github: https://github.com/linzhangUCA/homer_me

docs.title: Tools
docs.text:
Following tools are handy.

  • Safety goggles
  • Philips (PH1) screwdriver
  • (2mm) Allen wrench key
  • Needle nose pliers
  • Tweezers
  • Wire cutter and stripper
  • Crimping tool
  • Li-ion battery charger
